text: (tumhaare poojy achchhe hai) ya vah jisane aakaashon aur dharatee ko paida kiya aur tumhaare lie aakaash se paanee barasaaya; usake dvaara hamane ramaneey udyaan ugae? tumhaare lie sambhav na tha ki tum unake vrkshon ko ugaate. - kya allaah ke saath koee aur prabhu-poojy hai? nahin, balki vahee log maarg se hatakar chale ja rahe hai
